Enjoyable on both casual and competitive playing

I have played Counter Strike for over 13 years from CS:S to CS:GO. Ever since playing this game I really can't play any other competitive shooter for more than a few hours before coming back to CS. There really is no other game that can match CS's skill ceiling and depth of strategy.
2.7k and still going. If you can ignore toxicity this game is incredibly rewarding.
